title: "Minerva Intelligence, in Partnership with 4DM, to Design a New National-Scale Hydrographic Data Model for Natural Resources Canada"
excerpt: "CNW/ - Minerva Intelligence Inc. (TSXV: MVAI) (\"Minerva\" or the \"Company\"), an artificial intelligence company focused on knowledge engineering, in partnership with 4DM Inc. (\"4DM\"), is pleased to announce the signing of a contract with Natural Resources Canada (\"NRCan\") to design an updated Canadian hydrographic data model to enhance essential water resource information."
